description.text: I started at PRA during the MVP stage of prapay.com. It was an exciting time that allowed for many opportunities and fun challenges to help our customers and grow the business.

Performing full stack development utilizing my front end design and development skills while learning ASP.Net MVC 5. My tasks for all sprints included full stack development utizilizing async requests to internal APIs to retrieve JSON data and pass it back to the view model to be displayed in the view.

Researching and documenting new features.  Identifying a need or hinderance, envisioning a solution, researching both, documenting findings, and architecting out how to apply it to the current system.
Working closely with our product owner and stake holders, we designed and developed new features focusing on our user's experiences, satisfaction, abandonment, and conversions.

achievements.text: Lead corporate redesign of prapay.com.  Initial average increase of $3.5 million in monthly income via payments made through web application after redesign.
Lead redesign of payment process user experience for the United Kingdom prapay.com web application.  Initial monthly increase of $1 million in income through payments made.
Designed and developed a virtual assistant using the W3C speech synthesis and speech recognition APIs.

contributions.text: Standardized developer guidelines for front end coding per best practices.
Balsamic wireframing during concept phases to capture interfaces and flows.
Bootstrap 4 / SASS / jQuery for rapid prototyping for clickables demos and final builds.
Implemented daily team code reviews for guidance and collaberation.
User experience audits and enhancements with LightHouse and Axe.
ADA accessability for WCAG 2.0 compliancy.
Conceived, researched, designed, and developed new features to improve our customers experience and increase conversions for the web application.

description.text: True Health Diagnostics purchased Health Diagnostic Laboratories and I was offered the position of Lead UX Developer.

My duties focused on front end design and development, mainly development.  I worked with product owners, architects, java / .net developers, and stake holders to help design and develop for both new applications and enhancements to our current ones.

I had the pleasure of working with many extremely knowledgeable and creative people during my time at True Health Diagnostics and Health Diagnostic Laboratory, growing both professionaly and personaly.

achievements.text: Conceived, researched, designed, and developed new features to improve our customers experience and increase conversions for the web application.
Integrations of responsive designs with back end code for single page and MVC applications.

contributions.text: Standardized developer guidelines for front end coding per best practices.

description.text: Health Diagnostic Laboratories was an incredible place to work, they had a great mission that helped a lot of people improve their lives.  Leadership there was fantastic, and the atmosphere was extremely condusive to creating and developing.

My main duties focused on front end design and development.  I worked very closely with our executives, product owners, and stake holders to help design and develop both new applications and enhancements to our current ones.
I had the pleasure of working with many extremely knowledgeable and creative people during my time with HDL and True Health Diagnostics, growing both professionaly and personaly with them.
Health Diagnostic Laboratories was purchased by True Health Diagnostic.

description.text: Working in the medical field for GE Healthcare was amazing.  Trips to the hospitals to see our products in action was extremely gratifying and motivating to constantly improve them.

My main duties focused on front end design and development.  I worked closely with architects, product owners, and stake holders to help design and develop features that could improve the lives of medical professionals and patients.

Extensive AngularJS development.

description.text: Worked closely with Senior Leadership, Management, Designers, and Developers to lead the UI/UX development of a custom 960 responsive grid system to meet their requirements for web, mobile, ASP.net and J2EE integration for their multiple ecommerce based websites including walmart.stationery.com, iprint.com, and officedepot.com.
My main duties focused on front end design and development.  I worked very closely with the Texas team to help design and develop enhancements to integrate their products.
Supporting the developers' efforts to integrate resulting product with back end development.

I was able to utilized my front end strengths and grow them by working closely with team members, stake holders, and product managers.
